definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Thermometer shed, Hong Kong Observatory, Tsimshatsui, Kowloon.
sentences.chinese: 溫度表棚，九龍尖沙咀香港天文臺。

sentences.english: Maternal heart is children people emotive thermometer.
sentences.chinese: 母親的心是兒女們感情的溫度表。

sentences.english: The thermometer had dropped to 18 degrees below zero, but we still chose to sleep in the porch as usual.
sentences.chinese: 溫度表降到零下十八度的時候，我們也是在廊下睡覺。

sentences.english: For detailed Operating Pressure, refer to Pressure Temperature Chart on page 46.
sentences.chinese: 要了解工作壓力細節，參閱第46頁的壓力溫度表。

sentences.english: The fundamental constitute and working elements of electronic thermometer was elaborated.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了電子溫度表組成部分的基本構成和工作原理。

sentences.english: This paper makes introduction of the construction of the temperature gauge and fuel guage for vehicle and their basic operation principles.
sentences.chinese: 介紹汽車溫度表與燃油表的組成及其簡單工作原理。
昨天溫度表上顯示的讀數爲攝氏29度。
溫度表已降到零下20攝式度。

sentences.english: Earth thermometers, Hong Kong Observatory, Tsimshatsui, Kowloon.
sentences.chinese: 土壤溫度表，九龍尖沙咀香港天文臺。

sentences.english: I can't read what the thermometer says.
sentences.chinese: 我不會看溫度表上的度數。
